casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rontel Vincae ROYSTER 441A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 18, 2018 Geeta Kapur, Attorney at Law, for Royster, Rontel Vincae Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of December 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

*440"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of December 2018."
